summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD EDGE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT AFTER CLOSING THE DRIVER SIDE DOOR, THE DOOR AJAR WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED INDICATING THAT THE DOOR WAS STILL OPEN CAUSING THE DOME LIGHT TO REMAIN ON. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER. THE TECHNICIAN DIAGNOSED THAT THE DOOR LOCK SENSOR NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 40,000.
